full_summary:
# Diesel Engine Driven Forklift Trucks Tender Announcement
## Overview
Transport Canada is inviting tender for the purchase of two (2) diesel engine driven forklift trucks. This procurement opportunity is open to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offers (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A.

## Key Details

* **Solicitation Number**: T2012-220134
* ** Contracting Authority**: Suzanne LeBreton, [suzanne.lebreton@tc.gc.ca](mailto:suzanne.lebreton@tc.gc.ca), 506-961-9268
* **Trade Agreements**: Eligible trade agreements under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* **Delivery Date**: Contracts must be completed within 260 days of award
* **Regions**: Opportunities are available in New Brunswick and Nova Scotia

## Tender Process

* **Pre-Qualification**: Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the RFSA E60HS-21FRKL/A to participate in this tender.
* **Debriefings**: Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Requests must be made to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days of notification of bid results.

## Contract Duration and Payment

* **Contract Duration**: The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is within 260 days after contract award or before.
* **Payment Terms**: Payment details and conditions will be outlined in the contract documents.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Suzanne LeBreton, [suzanne.lebreton@tc.gc.ca](mailto:suzanne.lebreton@tc.gc.ca), 506-961-9268
* **Address**: 95 Foundry Street, Moncton, New Brunswick, E1C 8K6
